tool_description: Lets you query Gameservers for Informations like player-count, map, maxplayers, ...
name: Gameserver Query
title: Gameserver Query

api_list.name: Game Server Query
api_list.description: You can find additional Informations and a List of the supported Games under https://market.mashape.com/millyvanilly/gameserver-query/overview

required_parameters.name: host
required_parameters.description: The Domain name or IP Address of the Game Server

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The Game Type of the Game Server

optional_parameters.name: token
optional_parameters.description: REST user token, only required for Terraria

optional_parameters.name: port
optional_parameters.description: Server Port, only required if not default

optional_parameters.name: port_query
optional_parameters.description: The Query Port, only required if not default

optional_parameters.name: login
optional_parameters.description: Only required for Nadeo Games like ShootMania, TrackMania ...

optional_parameters.name: password
optional_parameters.description: Only required for Nadeo Games like ShootMania, TrackMania ...
